snippet.title: "The Gate" - Screaming Metal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the Android version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobage.ww.a.HellInvaders_Android&hl=en

The Gate uniquely combines Card Collecting Game (CCG) game design with Real Time Strategy (RTS) controls and mechanics. Battles are rendered in hand animated 3D while collectable cards are presented as beautifully illustrated artistic masterpieces. Solo battles provide a chance to strengthen your army, while Raids, Arena Battles, and World Bosses get your friends in on fight.
